definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Many spot lights towards a central point on a piece of white paper.
sentences.chinese: 衆多的聚光燈都照向一張白紙的中心點。

sentences.english: For each assignment, you will analyze one feature-length film in which law is a central character.
sentences.chinese: 每份作業分析一部以法律爲中心點的故事長片。

sentences.english: Frame the detail in the center of the photo, and then on the edge.
sentences.chinese: 將細部構圖在相片的中心點，接着再試試邊緣。

sentences.english: Xavi received the ball in a central position on the edge of Inter's penalty area.
sentences.chinese: 哈維在國米的小禁區前中心點得球。

sentences.english: The closest distance between the competitor's torso and the center of the longest dimension of the handgun grip.
sentences.chinese: 選手身體與手槍握把依長軸的中心點之間的最近距離。

sentences.english: In this paper, the United States the re-development of rail transportation focal point for research.
sentences.chinese: 本文以美國軌道交通的再次發展爲中心點進行研究。

sentences.english: Center point coordinates are located at 17 degrees, 5 minutes east longitude and 5 degrees, 0 minutes north latitude.
sentences.chinese: 中心點素座標位於東經17度5分，北緯5度0分。

sentences.english: Cabot Trail is the center of Brayton Point Highlands National Park.
sentences.chinese: 卡博特之路的中心點是布雷頓角高地國家公園。

sentences.english: The focus of the mandala symbolizes the center of energy.
sentences.chinese: 曼陀羅的中心點象徵着能量的中心。

sentences.english: Be sure that the endpoint of the line highlights when you select the center point for each circle.
sentences.chinese: 確保當您選取每個圓的中心點時，直線的端點會亮顯。

sentences.english: Our investment approach centres on in-depth analysis of country fundamentals.
sentences.chinese: 我們的投資方案以深度分析國家基本條件作爲中心點。

sentences.english: The following code configures and LOD node to use a user-defined center.
sentences.chinese: 下面的代碼將設置LOD節點使用用戶定義的中心點。

sentences.english: The coronet must be evenly centered, and should have a pinpoint center.
sentences.chinese: 頭頂的冠必須是居中的，並且有中心點。

sentences.english: Tool shanks and draw-in must have a central through bore.
sentences.chinese: 刀柄和引入軸必帶一個穿過鑽孔的中心點。

definition: Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Wufeng township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan
variant of 紓壓|纾压[shu1 ya1]
